title.en: Prayer to the Supreme Lord of Siddhas Tsultrim Zangpo

text.en: oṃ maṇi padme hūṃ
text.en-trans: om mani padmé hung

text.en: Oṃsignifies the nature possessing the five wisdoms.
text.en-trans: om gyi rangzhin yeshe ngaden

text.en: The very embodiment of the five buddha kāyas—
text.en-trans: sangye ku nga düpé daknyi

text.en: To the guru and supreme adept, Tsultrim Zangpo,
text.en-trans: lama drub chok tsultrim zangpor

text.en: I offer heartfelt prayer: inspire me with your blessings.
text.en-trans: nying né soldeb dak gyü jin lob

text.en: Purify my bad karma, misdeeds and obscurations.
text.en-trans: lé ngen dikdrib dakpar gyur chik

text.en: Masignifies maternal compassion for all beings,
text.en-trans: ma ni nyingjé drowa kün la

text.en: Lord Avalokiteśvara’s love, like that for an only child.
text.en-trans: bu chik tar tsé chenrezik wang

text.en: To the great compassionate one, Tsultrim Zangpo,
text.en-trans: tukjé chenpo tsultrim zangpor

text.en: I offer heartfelt prayer: inspire me with your blessings.
text.en-trans: nying né soldeb dak gyü jin lob

text.en: Lead us out of the ocean of suffering in the six realms.
text.en-trans: rik druk dukngal tso lé drong dzö

text.en: Ṇirepresents the equality of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa.
text.en-trans: ni ni khordé nyampa nyi dal

text.en: To the lord of yogins, Tsultrim Zangpo,
text.en-trans: chö kün duma ro chik zikpé

text.en: Who perceives the single nature of all diverse phenomena,
text.en-trans: naljor wangchuk tsultrim zangpor

text.en: I offer heartfelt prayer: inspire me with your blessings.
text.en-trans: nying né soldeb dak gyü jin lob

text.en: Help me to realize the equalness of all dharmas.
text.en-trans: chö kün nyamnyi tokpar dzö chik

text.en: Padrepresents non-attachment, the unsullied.
text.en-trans: pé ni chakmé dul dang dralwar

text.en: To the all-knowing, all-seeing Tsultrim Zangpo,
text.en-trans: chö kün ma dré sosor tokpé

text.en: Who understands all things precisely without error,
text.en-trans: tamché khyen zik tsultrim zangpor

text.en: I offer heartfelt prayer: inspire me with your blessings.
text.en-trans: nying né soldeb dak gyü jin lob

text.en: Help me to actualize my own self-knowing awareness.
text.en-trans: soso rangrig ngöngyur dzö chik

text.en: Merepresents spontaneous and effortless activity,
text.en-trans: mé ni trinlé bemé lhündrub

text.en: Fulfilling the hopes and wishes of beings.
text.en-trans: drowé rendö yizhin kangwa

text.en: To Tsultrim Zangpo, font of all wants and requirements,
text.en-trans: gödö künjung tsultrim zangpor

text.en: I offer heartfelt prayer: inspire me with your blessings.
text.en-trans: nying né soldeb dak gyü jin lob

text.en: Spontaneously fulfil the hopes and wishes of disciples.
text.en-trans: duljé rekong lhün gyi drub dzö

text.en: Hūṃis primordial wisdom, free from dualistic perception,
text.en-trans: hung ni zungdzin nyimé yeshe

text.en: Unobscured, and as deep as the domain of space itself.
text.en-trans: dribdral namkhé ying tar zabpa

text.en: To Tsultrim Zangpo, who sees things just as they are,
text.en-trans: jizhin zikpé tsultrim zangpor

text.en: I offer heartfelt prayer: inspire me with your blessings.
text.en-trans: nying né soldeb dak gyü jin lob

text.en: Transfer the blessings of your wisdom realization.
text.en-trans: tukgyü gongpé jinlab pö dzö

text.en: From this moment on, throughout all my lives to come,
text.en-trans: di né kyé dang tserab küntu

text.en: May Tsultrim Zangpo, supreme lord of siddhas,
text.en-trans: lama drub chok tsul trim zangpö

text.en: Guide me, spontaneously fulfil my own and others’ aims,
text.en-trans: jezung rangzhen dön nyi lhündrub

text.en: And bless me, that I may master love and compassion.
text.en-trans: jam dang nyingjé jongwar jin lob

text.en: May the supreme bodhicitta of cherishing others above myself
text.en-trans: dakwé zhen ché changchub sem chok

text.en: Swiftly arise within my mindstream,
text.en-trans: nyurdu gyü la kyewar gyur né

text.en: And may I never tire of working for others’ sake.
text.en-trans: drowé dön drubjé la mi ngal

text.en: Inspire me, O protector, to become your equal.
text.en-trans: gönpo khyé dang tsungpar jin lob

text.en: Bless me to bring benefit to beings, as extensively as space.
text.en-trans: dro dön khakhyab jungwar jin lob
